setWaitTime(int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items.Cart
Calculates and sets the amount of time that a Cart will spend waiting in line before processing.
ShoppingCartQueue - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues
Implements a simple queue (first-in, first-out list) of shopping carts.
ShoppingCartQueue() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.ShoppingCartQueue
Creates an empty queue.
SimpleSimulatorRunner - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.ui
Simple class to run shopping cart checkout simulations.
SimpleSimulatorRunner() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.ui.SimpleSimulatorRunner
 
simulationColors() - Static method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.Simulator
Returns the array of colors assigned to the different Cart types.
simulationLabels() - Static method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.Simulator
Returns the array of strings describing the different Cart types.There are three string elements in the array: The ExpressCart label, the RegularShoppingCart label, and the SpecialHandlingCart label.
SimulationViewer - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.ui
Animates a simulations of checking shopping carts through a collection of checkout registers.
SimulationViewer() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.ui.SimulationViewer
Creates the user interface for the application.
Simulator - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation
The Simulator class both runs the simulation and provideds step-by-step information by responding to events that are managed from the EventCalendar class.
Simulator(int, int) - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.Simulator
Constructor for the Simulator class that is used to create a Store object, and an array of CheckoutRegisters.
SimulatorTest - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation
Tests to ensure proper functionality of Simulator class.
SimulatorTest() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.SimulatorTest
 
size() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.CheckoutRegister
Returns the number of carts still waiting to be processed in the CheckoutRegister's queue.
size() - Method in interface edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.LineOfItems
Determines the number of items in line.
size() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.ShoppingCartQueue
Returns the number of elements in the queue.
size() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.Store
Returns the number of Carts still in the shopping queue.
SpecialHandlingCart - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items
Class that handles the behavior and attributes for Express type variations cart class.
SpecialHandlingCart(int, int) - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items.SpecialHandlingCart
Constructor for the express variation of the Cart class.
SpecialHandlingCartTest - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items
Test class for the RegularShoppingCart class.
SpecialHandlingCartTest() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items.SpecialHandlingCartTest
 
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.ui.SimulationViewer
Determines whether the user changed the animation speed.
step() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.simulation.Simulator
Handles the next available event from the EventCalendar.
Store - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues
The Store class serves as a first-in-first-out type of queue that handles Cart objects that are currently still shopping in the store and have not been placed in a Register's checkout line.
Store(int, CheckoutRegister[]) - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.Store
Constructor for the Store object, which creates a first-in-first-out queue for Cart objects.
StoreTest - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues
Test class to ensure that Store class has correct functionality.
StoreTest() - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.queues.StoreTest
